metadata.title: Azure Blueprints Enterprise Governance Automation Parameters
metadata.description: Example parameters for deploying enterprise-grade governance automation with Azure Blueprints, Azure Policy, and Well-Architected Framework principles
metadata.author: Azure Bicep Template Generator

metadata.description: Primary deployment region for all resources. Choose a region that supports all required services and complies with data residency requirements.
Unique suffix for resource names to ensure global uniqueness. Use a combination of environment and sequence number or use uniqueString() function.
Environment designation affecting resource configuration and policies. Options: dev, staging, prod
Cost center identifier for resource tagging and billing allocation. Update with your organization's cost center code.
Email address of the governance team or resource owner. This will receive alerts and notifications.
Log Analytics workspace retention period in days (30-730). Consider compliance requirements and cost implications.
Enable diagnostic settings for all resources. Recommended for production environments.
Enable Azure Advisor recommendations and alerts. Helps with proactive governance and optimization.
Storage account SKU for compliance storage. Options: Standard_LRS, Standard_GRS, Standard_ZRS. GRS recommended for production.
